body.name: [Auto Focus Smart Projector] Android TV Projector 4K with Built-in Apps,XNoogo 1300ANSI Outdoor Movie Projector with WiFi6 & Bluetooth,Auto Keystone,50%Zoom,PPT,ARC,Projector for TV Stick/Phone/Laptop
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 45 mins
features: 【Auto Focus & Auto 6D Keystone】Effortlessly getting a sharp and rectangular image in seconds after powering on! XNoogo 4k projector comes with AUTO-FOCUS and AUTO-6D-KEYSTONE, saving hassle of manually adjustment. The displacement gyroscope and sensor detects every movement of the smart projector, adjusts the lens automatically to ensure images stay clear.The newest version of XNoogo smart projector adds auto correction, upgrades the OS.

【4K Support & 1300ANSI & 20000:1 Contrast Ratio】The wifi projector utilizes latest AI optical algorithms, paired with German high-transmittance lens, boasting an impressive 1300 ANSI lumens of brightness. Features native 1080P resolution and support for 4K movie playback, delivers a 20000:1 high contrast ratio for perfect detailing. Also, our projector offers a wide color gamut, including 130% RGB and 99% NTSC, ensuring the most precise color reproduction possible.

【Dual-band WiFi6 & Newest Bluetooth 5.2】 WiFi6 projector is compatible with 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks.Compared with the 5G network,it has three times faster speed, larger capacity for data transfer, and lower latency, which means our 4k projector with WiFi and Bluetooth can provide more stable and smoother transmission when used with a WiFi 6 router.With bluetooth 5.2, this bluetooth projector can easily connects to your ideal headphones, speakers, or other audio equipment.

【Android TV Projector with Netflix Bulit-in】Android TV Projector with 8000+ apps provides over 1,000,000+ movies and TV episodes. Watch favorites from YouTube, Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, HBO Max, and so on.(Tips: Some apps such as Netflix require an external USB mouse to be connected to the projector for easy accessing.)

【Fully-Sealed Engine & Wide Compatibility & 500" Big screen】This outdoor movie projector is designed base on fully-sealed optical concept, which means it will not easy to enter dust, effectively reducing black spots and image loss, and extending the lifespan of the projector.Equipped with HDMI*2/USB*2/AV/audio ports, it can easily connect to TV Stick/Phone/PC/Switch. You will be enjoying a Wonderful Viewing Experience with a wide range of 60-500 inches.

How To Ceiling Mount: Remove the footpads at the bottom of the projector to expose the screw holes. Fix the projector to your mount.Go to Settings -> Projection Settings -> Projection Mode, choose Front Ceiling.

Can I Connect this smart movie projector to my sound bar via hdmi-ARC ? Sure. The projector has two HD ports, and the HD1 port supports ARC. You can connect it to your desired sound bar via HD cable. Can I connect a mouse to the smart 4K projector for more convenient navigation on some apps? Yes, this LED projector has 2 USB ports, choose any one. How to put on the lens cap after using the auto focus movie projector? Long press the F+ button on the remote before shutdown the video projector. The lens will retract, and then put on the lens cap. How does this WiFi6 projector compatible with my old router for stable connection? Please tell us the model of your old router. We will provide corresponding firmware upgrade. How to get further assistance for this HD native 1080P projector? Please send us amazon messages or through the informations on the manual to get further assistance for this video projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear/ bright/ awesome!!!
reviews.reviewText: For the price point I was hoping for the best but not expecting much greatness out of it. I am pleasantly surprised with the picture clarity, picture brightness, ease of use, and mostly the value you get. I was looking for an upgrade from my 3500 lumen projector and also wanted the versatility of using it with my 120” indoor screen as well as my 20 foot inflatable outdoor screen. I am blown away with the all around quality of this item. This thing is ready to go right out of the box (which is a huge plus) it comes with a nice large light fabric screen with those 3M hanging hooks (nice surprise since I didn’t remember seeing that when I ordered it, plus it’s super easy to set up) it also comes with HDMI cord and audio cords. I’m able to hook up my sound bar and subwoofer with great ease with the different audio cords included (the sound quality of the built in speakers are decent as well but obviously less superior than using with good external speakers). I can use just the built in speakers when I use outside without any problems, but external speakers have more depth in sound. The smart phone mirroring feature is cool (I tried it out with my iPhone) while not practical for what I use it for still pretty cool. FYI you can open streaming apps from your device in mirroring but once you try to play a show/movie it won’t mirror through the projector (I think because of copywrite laws or something) but it’s simple enough to just plug in a firestick to play anything you’d like that way. The fan is also way quieter than expected, when turning on I have to double check it’s warming up because how quiet it is. It also has an adjustable height/tilt screw on the bottom which I was able to take out and connect to a generic tripod (for when I use outside). One thing it doesn’t have are mounting screw holes for a ceiling mount, there are probably attachments to remedy this but I always just use with my tripod so it doesn’t bother me. The versatility of picture size is incredible, no matter how small or large your desired picture size is there aren’t any discrepancies with the clarity of the picture that I’ve noticed. As I mentioned before I use this with my 20 foot inflatable outdoor projector screen and you can get a much much larger picture size which is incredible. This is by far my favorite projector I’ve ever purchased. When I first received this in the mail I did a quick set up inside to familiarize myself with it. While my other projector I have, the room has to be dang near pitch dark. This works just fine in any indoor light situation you come across. I can see the picture just fine in the middle of the day, window blinds open, and lights on. While the picture isn’t as great it’s still perfectly watchable.Pros: high quality/ easy to use/ lots of extras/ huge picture/ great clarity & brightness/ quiet fan/ own carrying-storage case/ decent built in speakers/ feels quite durable (not cheap)Cons: no ceiling mounts (I personally don’t care about this, but it’s just something to be aware of)/ so far I haven’t found any other cons for which I use this for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector for the price (got it for 225 on sale)
reviews.reviewText: For the price this projector is amazing. Very bright and clear. I love the auto focusing feature.It was easy to use the remote to correct the keystoning.There is some very light fan noise as others have mentioned, but it's what you would expect from a brighter projector since it needs to cool the lamp, etc. Not at all a distraction in my case.The ability to load apps for HBO Max, Disney+, Crunchyrole, and is a big plusThe only app we couldn't get working was Hulu, since it appears the version available is locked to Asia.I was pleasantly surprised that the remote worked without having to aim it at the unit (behind me).Overall a great little unit so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hit or Miss, cant log into prime vid app
reviews.reviewText: Devent picture works well but the biggest problems with this thing is that every single time that I use this, the corner correction, auto focus, and keystone correction go back to the original setting and it's bigger than the entire wall in our bedroom which is about 140 in wide. I have to keep the auto focus off otherwise it just resets and zooms itself back out. On top of that there is no Hulu app for this projector which sucks. Third, trying to open Amazon prime app and no keyboard pops up! The app seems to be incompatible with the projector itself, the login page pops up but the remote does absolutely nothing! It does not move the selection bar, no keyboard pops up to type in any login information and you can't even move down to the continue button. So the prime ap itself opens no problem, but there's no way to actually log in!!!! I've tried everything including hooking up a keyboard and my laptop. The main point of getting this projector was to use Amazon prime and now instead I have to screen mirror through my phone! Plus, when screen mirroring through the phone, the cast app has such bad lag on it, the video is incredibly choppy. The projector itself works fine, it connects to our Verizon cable box beautifully via Wi-Fi, all the other apps work fine! Other than these 3 particular issues, this thing is great all though it is DEFINITELY not a 4k projector. Its 1080p. There's no 4K or UHD settings on this thing. Make sure you turn off the auto focus on this thing when using it unless you wanna reaet it every time. They need to fix the compatibility issue with the remote and the projector and the prime app though big time.

La resolución de la imagen es buena pero el proyector produce mucho calor y el ventilador mucho ruido.El volumen de sonido se ve afectado por todo el ruido que genera el ventilador del protector.Me hizo considerar que la mejor opción habría Sido una pantalla
